MappingFields.Name: department
MappingFields.Description:
The name of the department in which the user works.
Maximum length is 64 characters.

MappingFields.Name: streetAddress
MappingFields.Description:
The street address of the user's place of business.
Maximum length is 1024 characters.

MappingFields.Name: mobilePhone
MappingFields.Description:
The primary cellular telephone number for the user.
Read-only for users synced from the on-premises directory.
Maximum length is 64 characters.

MappingFields.Name: mailNickname
MappingFields.Description:
[Required] The mail alias for the user.
Maximum length is 64 characters.

MappingFields.Name: surname
MappingFields.Description:
The user's surname (family name or last name).
Maximum length is 64 characters.

MappingFields.Name: givenName
MappingFields.Description:
The given name (first name) of the user.
Maximum length is 64 characters.

MappingFields.Name: displayName
MappingFields.Description:
[Required] The name displayed in the address book for the user. This is usually the combination of the user's first name, middle initial, and last name.
Maximum length is 256 characters.

MappingFields.Name: companyName
MappingFields.Description:
The name of the company that the user is associated with. This property can be useful for describing the company that an external user comes from.
The maximum length is 64 characters.

MappingFields.Name: employeeId
MappingFields.Description:
The employee identifier assigned to the user by the organization.
The maximum length is 16 characters.

MappingFields.Name: jobTitle
MappingFields.Description:
The user's job title.
Maximum length is 128 characters.

MappingFields.Name: userType
MappingFields.Description: A string value that can be used to classify user types in your directory, such as Member and Guest.

MappingFields.Name: id
MappingFields.Description:
[Required] The unique identifier for the user. Read-only.
Used as AccountReference.

MappingFields.Name: usageLocation
MappingFields.Description:
A two-letter country code (ISO standard 3166). Required for users that are assigned licenses due to legal requirements to check for availability of services in countries.
Examples include: US, JP, and GB. Not nullable.

MappingFields.Name: passwordProfile.password
MappingFields.Description: [Required] Specifies the password profile for the user. The profile contains the user's password. The password in the profile must satisfy minimum requirements as specified by the passwordPolicies property. By default, a strong password is required.

MappingFields.Name: passwordProfile.forceChangePasswordNextSignIn
MappingFields.Description: [Required] TRUE if the user must change their password on the next sign-in; otherwise FALSE.

MappingFields.Name: userPrincipalName
MappingFields.Description:
[Required] The user principal name (UPN) of the user. The UPN is an Internet-style sign-in name for the user based on the Internet standard RFC 822. By convention, this should map to the user's email name. The general format is alias@domain, where the domain must be present in the tenant's collection of verified domains.
NOTE: This property can't contain accent characters. Only the following characters are allowed A - Z, a - z, 0 - 9, ' . - _ ! # ^ ~.

MappingFields.Name: mail
MappingFields.Description:
The SMTP address for the user, for example, jeff@contoso.com. Changes to this property update the user's proxyAddresses collection to include the value as an SMTP address.
NOTE: This property can't contain accent characters. Only the following characters are allowed A - Z, a - z, 0 - 9, ' . - _ ! # ^ ~.
NOTE: We don't recommend updating this property for Azure AD B2C user profiles. Use the otherMails property instead.

MappingFields.Name: businessPhones
MappingFields.Description:
The telephone numbers for the user.
NOTE: Although it is a string collection, only one number can be set for this property.
Read-only for users synced from the on-premises directory.

MappingFields.Name: accountEnabled
MappingFields.Description: [Required] TRUE if the account is enabled; otherwise, FALSE.

MappingFields.Name: officeLocation
MappingFields.Description: The office location in the user's place of business.
